zone.line: Then why lift thus mine eyes to those stars,
Is that casket then of eyes a magnet?
Why will to me for once beautiful clearness?
As when in the nightly wood us moonshine surrounds
I salute thee, thou own vial
Which I with reverence now take down.
In thee venerate I mans knowledge & power
In the content of thy kind slumber juice,
Thou epitome of all deadly fine power
I see thee, that will pain alleviate
I hold thee, which struggles will diminish
The spirits tide ebbs little by little
Into the deep sea shall I out- ( ),
The mirror-flood glances at my feet
To new shores entices a new day
A chariot of fire floats on light wings
